des: "The juicy frog is a delicious, not-too-sweet, not-too-tart drink, ready for any party! Approved by rowdy French-Canadian women! Add more 7upÂ® to taste!"
ins: Place ice cubes in a glass and top with vodka, triple sec, lime cordial, sweet and sour mix, and lemon-lime soda, respectively. Mix well.
